entities.name: house of gaunt
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as a family with pure-bloods and wizards. It is introduced in the text as having already released Merope.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope is a person who has been released by the House of Gaunt. She is described as staggering away from Mr. Gaunt and massaging her neck.

entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: Mr. Gaunt is a person who is mentioned as having pure-bloods and wizards in his family. He is introduced as triumphantly saying that generations of pure-bloods are more than Mr. Gaunt can say.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Mr. Ogden is a person who is mentioned as being there because of Morfin and the Muggle he accosted late last night. He is described as doggedly saying that neither his ancestors nor Mr. Gaunt's have anything to do with the matter in hand.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is a person who has performed a jinx or hex on a Muggle, causing him to erupt in highly painful hives. He is described as giggling.

relationships.description: Mr. Gaunt is a member of the House of Gaunt, which has pure-bloods and wizards.
Mr. Ogden is concerned with Morfin because he accosted a Muggle late last night.
